statements: SELECT * FROM player_feedback
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT id, player_id, review_date FROM player_feedback WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1001
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, player_id, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT id, player_id, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(id) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_feedback > 5 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE game_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM GameReviews WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE reviewer_id = 2002 ORDER BY rating DESC, review_id;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback JOIN GameReviews ON PlayerFeedback.player_id = GameReviews.reviewer_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM Reviews WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Ratings WHERE rating_value >= 4 ORDER BY rating_date ASC;
SELECT rating_id, player_id, rating_value, rating_date FROM Ratings WHERE rating_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM Reviews WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, rating_value FROM Ratings WHERE rating_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp, player_id FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT id, rating FROM player_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_ratings WHERE game_id = 10 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT activity_type, activity_data FROM community_engagement ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT player_id, review_text, rating FROM player_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT game_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM game_ratings GROUP BY game_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT activity_type, activity_data FROM community_engagement WHERE activity_type = 'event' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM PlayerFeedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM GameRatings;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_feedbacks FROM PlayerFeedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM GameRatings GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%great%' AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT pr.player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM PlayerReviews pr JOIN GameRatings gr ON pr.player_id = gr.player_id GROUP BY pr.player_id HAVING num_reviews > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
